General.Name: Landcadia Holdings II Inc
General.Description: Landcadia Holdings IV, Inc. does not have significant operations. It intends to effect a merger, capital stock exchange, asset acquisition, stock purchase, reorganization, or similar business combination with one or more businesses in the dining, hospitality, entertainment, and gaming industries. The company was formerly known as JFG Holding I LLC. Landcadia Holdings IV, Inc. was incorporated in 2020 and is based in Houston, Texas.
General.Address: 1510 West Loop South, Houston, TX, United States, 77001
